memberdef.name: TEST_ASSERT
memberdef.initializer: do {\ test_count++;\ if (!(check)) {\ error_count++;\ fprintf(stderr, "lilv_test.c:%d: error: %s\n", __LINE__, #check);\ }\ } while (0)

memberdef.name: tests
memberdef.initializer: = { TEST_CASE(utils), TEST_CASE(value), TEST_CASE(verify), TEST_CASE(no_verify), TEST_CASE(discovery), TEST_CASE(lv2_path), TEST_CASE(classes), TEST_CASE(plugin), TEST_CASE(project), TEST_CASE(no_author), TEST_CASE(project_no_author), TEST_CASE(preset), TEST_CASE(prototype), TEST_CASE(port), TEST_CASE(ui), TEST_CASE(bad_port_symbol), TEST_CASE(bad_port_index), TEST_CASE(bad_port_index), TEST_CASE(string), TEST_CASE(state), { NULL, NULL } }

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *port_symbol, void *user_data, const void *value, uint32_t size, uint32_t type)
